level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 made a technical correction to the enacting clause of D.C. Law 19-21, § 9004(b) that did not change the repeal of this section

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-308.07.
For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 2-351.15.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 1061 of D.C. Law 19-21 provided that subtitle F of title I of the act may be cited as "OIG Auditing Reform Amendment Act of 2011".
